newsitem.title: USA: Iomega ships over 5 million Zip drives.
newsitem.headline: Iomega ships over 5 million Zip drives.

text.p: Iomega Corp, the maker of high-density computer disk drives, on Friday said global shipments of its Zip drive have passed five million units.
Iomega's 100 megabyte Zip disks provide 70 times the capacity of traditional floppy disks.

Iomega also unveiled an enhanced internal Zip drive for PC manufacturers and value-added resellers that will be availablein the second quarter. The advantage of the new internal ATAPI Zip drive is that it provides high performance with simple and affordable systems integration and compatibility, Iomega said in a statement.
